DOCNAME: CASE OF ASLAN AND DEMİR v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial
JUDGES: Françoise Tulkens;Ireneu Cabral Barreto;Nona Tsotsoria;Vladimiro Zagrebelsky
TEXT: 4. The applicants were born in 1974 and 1960 respectively and live in Turkey. The facts common to these cases are that the applicants were arrested and placed in custody in different times and places. During their custody period, they were interrogated by the police, the public prosecutor and the investigating judge respectively, in the absence of a lawyer. These statements were subsequently used for their convictions by the trial court.
